sentence_zh_TW: 每當有新片上映時，我都會去電影院觀看，享受觀影的樂趣。
sentence: Whenever a new film is released, I go to the ______ to enjoy the experience.

sentence_zh_TW: 當我的褲子鬆弛時，我需要調整腰圍以確保合身。
sentence: When my pants are ______, I need to adjust the waist to ensure a proper fit.

sentence_zh_TW: 郵局裡，工作人員正在為客戶整理各種包裹，確保準時送達。
sentence: At the post office, the staff are sorting various ______ for timely delivery to customers.

sentence_zh_TW: 她把咖啡杯放在漂亮的淺碟上，這樣看起來更優雅。
sentence: She placed the coffee cup on a beautiful ______ to make it look more elegant.

sentence_zh_TW: 這種木製凳子不僅耐用，而且在客廳里看起來很時尚。
sentence: This wooden ______ is not only durable but also looks stylish in the living room.

sentence_zh_TW: 在晚上，小孩們總是會告訴彼此關於他們的怪物故事以嚇唬彼此。
sentence: At night, the children always tell each other stories about their ______ to scare one another.

sentence_zh_TW: 她對他毅力的欽佩讓她決定不放棄追尋自己的夢想。
sentence: Her ______ for his perseverance inspired her to pursue her dreams without giving up.

sentence_zh_TW: 該委員會負責制定政策以改善社區的教育水平，讓每個孩子都有機會接受良好的教育。
sentence: The ______ is responsible for creating policies to improve educational standards in the community, ensuring every child has the opportunity for a quality education.

sentence_zh_TW: 在不同的社會場合中，穿著適當的衣服能讓你感到更自信。
sentence: Wearing ______ clothing in various social settings can help you feel more confident.

sentence_zh_TW: 這項法律的目的是為了限制某些危險物質的使用，以保護公共健康和環境。
sentence: The purpose of this law is to ______ the use of certain hazardous substances to protect public health and the environment.

sentence_zh_TW: 在進行危險的運動時，保持穩定的心態和身體姿勢是至關重要的。
sentence: When engaging in dangerous sports, it is essential to maintain a ______ mindset and body posture.

sentence_zh_TW: 醫生建議我應該減少頻繁的熬夜，以改善我的整體健康。
sentence: The doctor advised me to reduce my ______ late nights to improve my overall health.

sentence_zh_TW: 他把所有的書本放在桌子上，形成了一個高高的堆，讓他感到很滿足。
sentence: He placed all the books on the table, creating a tall ______ that gave him a sense of satisfaction.

sentence_zh_TW: 某些化學物質對環境是有害的，因此應該避免在日常生活中使用。
sentence: Certain chemicals are ______ to the environment and should be avoided in daily life.

sentence_zh_TW: 她的演講具有戲劇性的效果，讓所有聽眾都感覺到強烈的情感共鳴。
sentence: Her speech had a ______ impact that resonated deeply with all the audience.

sentence_zh_TW: 如果你不及時清理過期的食物，它們會開始腐爛並佔據你的冰箱空間。
sentence: If you don't clear out expired food in time, they will start to ______ and take up space in your refrigerator.

sentence_zh_TW: 醫生告訴我每天要遵循規定的劑量，這樣才能保證藥物的效果。
sentence: The doctor instructed me to follow the prescribed ______ daily to ensure the efficacy of the medication.

sentence_zh_TW: 她的女僕在清晨為她準備了一杯香茶，讓她的一天開始得更加愉快。
sentence: Her ______ prepared a cup of fragrant tea for her in the morning, making her day start off pleasantly.

sentence_zh_TW: 這些年輕的舞者將代表我們的團隊參加即將舉行的全國舞蹈比賽。
sentence: These young dancers will ______ our team in the upcoming national dance competition.

sentence_zh_TW: 這幅畫展示了一位赤裸的女人，在自然光的照射下展現出優雅的姿態。
sentence: This painting depicts a ______ woman, displaying an elegant pose under natural light.
